website_summaries.verdict: If you like its bamboo styling and don't need a lot of privacy, it's worth considering.
pros: Stands out for its lightweight bamboo craftsmanship that adds a natural element to any room's decor
Its 4 panels open and fold easily for maneuverability and storage
cons: While it divides a room, it doesn't offer much privacy
On the higher end of the price spectrum

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This light weight wall divider is absolutely beautiful. It's being used in my living room to block the desk view which is throwing off the decor in my apt. It does show through some light but that is fine. It actually makes it more beautiful during the day when the sun is shining through. I placed a large brown base in front of it with small flowers shooting out of it which really sets it off. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ayers

customer_reviews.title: I can move it easily. I wanted something other than a curtain there ...
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I wanted which was to screen off my sliding glass door on my neighbor's side of my house. I can move it easily. I wanted something other than a curtain there and this was perfect. Very attractive color and weave that goes with any decor inside and outside. Nice material and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Maura Shea

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough but...
customer_reviews.text: It's fine, seems sturdy enough, but you definitely can see right through it, which is an issue since we're going to use it to close off a guest sleeping area. We'll throw a couple of large scarves over it and make do.
customer_reviews.author: Prairierose

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade from cat-shredded paper screen
customer_reviews.text: I had a typical paper screen to use as a room divider until my cats destroyed it. This is not entirely cat proof (I'd have had to buy a wooden screen for that) but will stand up to claws longer. Very sturdy, long enough for the room, and opaque enough for privacy. When unpacked, it had the same smell as Ikea furniture.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping toddler from diving off the couch!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this divider! We have a raised ranch and our couch sits against a banister just over the staircase. With a now-climbing toddler, I needed something so she didn't go diving over the couch. It works fabulously! It's just strong enough, just wide enough, and just neutral enough for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: ChellyB

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Privacy Screen
customer_reviews.text: Shipping box and top of screen were damaged. Aside from that, the screen itself was light and flimsy. The frame around the screen seemed to be made out of very cheap wood, and the screws in the hinges were not flush against the hardware. It is a nice looking screen, however. But, definitely not worth the $120. We returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Really great buy. Very happy with it. Looks much better in person than photo. I did use some old irons to support the base because my rug is rather thick and I worried my pets might knock it over. I needed an extra guest room and used this to create one. My guest was able to hang a suit on a hanger from the top and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this purchase. I had looked at privacy panels at some stores and found them rather flimsy. This arrived promptly and I am very satisfied. It does the job of room divider and privacy panel very efficiently and is very decorative as well. A good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Picture does not do the screen justice--very ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Picture does not do the screen justice--very attractive. Came promptly and in perfect condition. Highly recommend if you need an inexpensive screen. Stands up well on my carpeted floor.
customer_reviews.author: stpetebruce

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but transparent
customer_reviews.text: This screen is VERY pretty, has a tropical woven look, I absolutely love it. The only problem is that we bought it to serve as a privacy screen for a side room that has no door, and learned after it arrived that it's not opaque, you can see right through it : ( If you need a privacy screen this is not the right pick, but if you just want a beautiful divider and don't mind seeing through it then I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful with the honey brown colored wood floors in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Looks beautiful with the honey brown colored wood floors in the laundry room and it covers the water heater & furnace nicely. Better quality than I expected too and no damage in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: o-LORA

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Low quality flimsy divider. It will barely stand on its own as long as you don't touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica S.

customer_reviews.title: A very unusual use for this screen, but it worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: We had to close off the top of a stairwell that didn't have a door. It was to prevent a blind cat from going downstairs. It worked perfectly. It is light weight enough for us to move for easy access to the stairs & wide enough to cover the area needed. I know this is an unusual use for this, but we had to look long & hard to find something that would work.
customer_reviews.author: lololsn

customer_reviews.title: Please with the looks, color, and quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very please to order this divider. It looks classy. It stands firm. I use it as divider between two room. It's made of bambo, don't expect to be very sturdy. I wont recommend any divider if you have kids or animals. Unless put in corner or you have a well behave kids. It might knock it down.
customer_reviews.author: Mirby

customer_reviews.title: You can see through it
customer_reviews.text: This product looks good, is easy to move around...but the biggest drawback is that YOU CAN SEE THROUGH IT! Got this for a privacy corner for nursing moms to have privacy at a professional setting, but it’s not very good since you can see through it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A Bright Idea and Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I am beside myself with how wonderful this product is. It far exceeded my expectations. The workmanship is flawless. I purchased two beige they were light (in weight) enough for a 5' 5" woman to comfortably carry up and down stairs, but still sturdy enough to be used between my living room and office. They actually brightened up my entire space. They are truly like a breath of fresh air. I smile every time I pass them.
customer_reviews.author: The Recessionista

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great screen/room divider. I searched through a lot of room dividers before finding this one with great reviews. It’s sturdy enough to stand well, but very light and easy to move. The wider panels made this the perfect width to hide our treadmill from view.
customer_reviews.author: KKLJ

customer_reviews.title: I would and did buy it again
customer_reviews.text: The box was sturdy ,the corners were protected. The item was protected with plastic and was in perfect condion. I really like the thread colors with the natural color bamboo. I decided to use this screen to build a wall to partion off the back of a room so I can use the space as storage. It looks great so I ordered another on to complete the width of the room.
customer_reviews.author: DBL

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Addition to Room
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase! Fits perfect in my apartment - providing false wall for privacy. High enough to prevent people from seeing in and two will cover the length of a room. I use in the living room. Note that you can see slightly through the panels when light shines through, but it is nice as it creates a nice effect. I double up the excess panels for additional privacy where they overlap. Just be aware if you are using for full privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Moned

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for some front patio privacy, but it was so nicely made that I brought it inside and placed it in front of my oversized patio doors for a bit of privacy. Ordered a second one to cover the remaining doors and together they look amazing. I have privacy without draperies, get lots of light, plus these look wonderful with my natural bamboo floors. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sally G.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with the quality and value of this room divider! I researched for hours to find the right room divider and am glad I finally chose to buy this one! I decided to buy the brown one, which in person is more of a slight reddish brown (medium brown with a hint of cherry stain). It’s very nice, with clean lines and a classic look. I have mine in a family room that has low-medium pile thick carpet and it is not tippy at all. I’m very happy with this purchase! I hope it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: NBrownie

customer_reviews.title: Defective screens
customer_reviews.text: Pretty ... but ... 1st screen had defect in weave. 2nd screen had decay in wood frame. Sent both back. For nearly $100, we should get a perfect screen. Trying a 3rd order, as I need a medical clinic screen. Hope they send me a perfect one this time.
customer_reviews.author: Bewise

customer_reviews.title: Purrrfect!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to dive an area off for cat purposes. It is a beautiful screen. It stand well on hardwood. I think it would do well on carpet, it sturdy and well balanced. I will be purchasing another for our living room, it will be nice to have one we can move around.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Woman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful privacy room divider/screen. Nice quality and looks like I paid lots more than I did! Tall and wide enough for what I needed it for, and stands on its own without issues.
customer_reviews.author: MrsSnd

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bamboo screen!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the screen to use as a display to hang my handwoven wall hangings from. I made tiny S hooks from thin wire to hang them from in a staggered pattern on the panels. My screen is now in an art shop downtown, where my weavings are for sale. The shop owner loves the bamboo screen and it's functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Auntkay53

customer_reviews.title: Very nice neutral piece
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described in the product description. They're very lightweight which is nice for moving but because of this it also makes them a little flimsy. It almost feels like balsa wood. Smells great like cedar and the color is nice and natural. A lot of compliments on it and I like how easy it is to move.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! I bought this to separate my cats with ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I bought this to separate my cats with a visiting cat. I like the wider width which worked well in my hallway. It's low to the ground so the cats could not fit under.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: sturdy enough and pretty enough
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep privacy in my bedroom while giving overnight houseguests access to the only bathroom (which is in my bedroom). I put it away in the corner when guests leave. It's pretty, and light enough for most people to maneuver without much difficulty, and also quite tall and wide.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, but definitely use indoors.
customer_reviews.text: This looks beautiful, and if used indoors would probably have a much longer life than it did for us. We purchased it as a temporary solution for privacy around an outdoor shower. The elements (wind in particular) had a heyday with it even though we had used heavy-duty hinges to attach it to the side of the house, one panel in particular did not "weather" the storm very well and at the end of the season, we had to throw it away. But it is quite lovely and would certainly do better indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Judith K. Pinkerton

customer_reviews.title: For the price, good product - meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: My only "complaint", if I must make one, is that the hinges are stainless silver. On the 6 panel partition the hinges are brown. It is lightweight, easily moved by one person (for it's size), and the quality is as you would expect a sub $100 partition - might last me two years being moved a few times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jason.Feller

customer_reviews.title: This room divider does the job
customer_reviews.text: We were setting up a bedroom in what had been more of a family room and needed a divider that would provide privacy but not block out too much light. This product does the trick. It came ready to go with no problems and was an easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Gale B. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Nice... is an Understatement
customer_reviews.text: I have a full grown male Newfoundland with a love affair of barking at the poor mailman, through our patio sliding door. He's torn up more mini blinds; curtains; and coverings than I care to ever mention. This worked beautifully! - It comes fully assembled right out of the box. Solid and durable. Yet, light and easy to move. A perfect blend of privacy and allowing some light to come through. - The coverage is spot on for those wider areas with these 4 panels, compared to the standard 3. Would buy it again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS SCREEN!
customer_reviews.text: Im beyond happy with this folding screen. It's lightweight enough I can carry it - yet not so flimsy that it easily would get knocked over. VERY nice quality. Also packed well in shipping box! I spend hours on Amazon analyzing screens, then selected this one! I'm SO happy I did!
customer_reviews.author: I Love To Be Selling - Kathy Terrill

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleasantly suprised by this product. It’s light, stands well and seems quite sturdy. It is much more beautiful than I could see online with shimmery stitching. I put it in my office to hide cables and utility boxes and it looks beautiful with my light desk.
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Woman

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use in an office. It is very attractive. The six panel size is just right for the area we put it in. It lets light through and screens much better than I imagined. I recommend it and would buy it again if the need arose.
customer_reviews.author: MFTRider

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, attractive, and light
customer_reviews.text: Glad we got this to block visual access through glass panels at our front door at night. Easy to open and close and light weight to move around. Very nice clean look. Very nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: C H B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE MY - Bamboo 4 Panel Hinged Privacy Screen Portable Folding Room Divider
customer_reviews.text: GREAT - beautiful - sturdy - assembled - some light comes through but just enough to make it not too dark --- Bamboo 4 Panel Hinged Privacy Screen Portable Folding - advertised as a Room Divider - But i use it instead of a curtain for my sliding door at night and when it's chilly A GREAT purchase - THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Susie in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Basic screen.  Does not offer privacy.
customer_reviews.text: This item seems way too expensive to me for the quality. It is a nice basic room divider. I would not call it a privacy screen as you can see right through it. I'll keep it, but have to throw a blanket over it for privacy.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to hide some things. Thanks to the company.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a room divider for my studio apartment. I was worried that it would significantly darken the area that lay behind it, but it still lets in a nice amount of light. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This came quickly, was well packaged, and fully assembled. It gives us the ability to create a private space for visitors and is a nice looking addition.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this room divider/screen! So glad I found it as it does exactly what I need. The workmanship, color, and materials used are excellent. It's tall enough, wide enough, with an elegant look to it. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sure

customer_reviews.title: Hides exercise equipment!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs and hides exercise equipment. Living in a smaller home, need to double up on space in some rooms. This hides the machines til pulled out each time. Simple, maneuver is all it takes.
customer_reviews.author: Java Junkie

customer_reviews.title: great product..
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and exactly as described by seller... Unfortunately it just did not provide the effect we were looking for in trying to break up a large room, so we elected to return it. That said, I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT WITHOUT HESITATION FOR ITS OVERALL QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: dr. boyt

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice Screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hide my furnace in the basement. I'm pretty impressed with the way it looks. It seems well made, and is easy to move around. Overall, I'm pretty satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lewpubco

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fesign and material. Horrible quality. Do not use outside (slightest wind blows it down) or get it wet. The bamboo molds and wood decays. It has no stability unless placed a certain way because there are no feet to secure and balance the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Journey

customer_reviews.title: Economical and Easy Way to Provide Privacy.
customer_reviews.text: We have an open loft that we occasionally need to use for sleeping space when we have extra guests. The solution was a rollaway bed and this Decorative Freestanding Beige Woven Bamboo 4 Panel Screen. The screen is sturdy and good looking, and when it is open it provides about 6 feet of space; it is tall enough that you cannot see over it - truly offers a good amount of privacy. The four panels fold up nicely and it is easy to store when not in use. It is an easy and economical way to provide privacy, but can also be used as a partial room divider. The bamboo is a nice neutral color. I definitely recommend this screen.
customer_reviews.author: SoozeSays

customer_reviews.title: Did the Job
customer_reviews.text: A couple of little dings from shipping, but it did the job. Provided privacy for guests sleeping on our pull-out couch-- there are still little spaces between the bamboo pieces, but it's not see-through.
customer_reviews.author: CoolDude

customer_reviews.title: it is sturdy and adequate for us
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and was as described. For our purposes, which was to block the morning sun on our deck, we found that there was more light coming through than expected even though we knew it was made of woven bamboo. All in all, however, it is sturdy and adequate for us. It is susceptible to wind of any degree so we have to make sure that it is taken down when we are not outside near it. It looks very nice and fairly easy to move around even for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Pat from Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Lighter Weight
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't put this together for the money so no complaints there. It does the job in my office. This is lightweight to the point of struggling to stand without significant fold angles even if on low-pile office carpet. If you need something sturdy, a screen with a more substantial frame is required. I'll put L-brackets on the legs to compensate.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: These look even better than they do in the photo
customer_reviews.text: These look even better than they do in the photo. GREAT for the price! Be aware that the wood is unfinished, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT a privacy screen!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this only 1 star, because I need a privacy screen and it isn't a privacy screen. You can see through it from a darkened space on one side to a lighted space on the other. But I gave it an additional star because it really is very attractive and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: slc

customer_reviews.title: the four panels make it sturdier, I'm now hoping ...
customer_reviews.text: the four panels make it sturdier, I'm now hoping that the cats do not tear it up. It looks very nice
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I ordered one first and then after saw the beautiful product, I ordered two more.
customer_reviews.author: xin feng

customer_reviews.title: nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to screen an outside shower. It's much nicer than I expected for the price- reasonably sturdy, and has lovely stitching holding the slats together. I wouldn't expect it to hold up very long term outdoor in inclement weather, but should work in the mild weather where I live.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for the price. I was looking for a free standing screen to block the cold air from a bedroom AC from blowing directly on my bed. This works perfectly. Very well made, attractive and very light.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: ... which arrived today - before noon - is exactly like the one I already have
customer_reviews.text: The 4-panel screen which arrived today - before noon - is exactly like the one I already have. I needed a 2nd one to better hide my work and storage area in my room at our vacation home. It looks much better now and I;m happy. Besides, it comes at an affordable price - under $100 - that's pretty good and the pale beige color can fit almost anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Alegiani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in good shape, ready to go, just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jago

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use it to block sun from my sliding glass doors on excessive heat days. Works great looks better than curtains I think.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with purchase.It’s good quality and looking good in the bedroom.Only one unsatisfactory with Fedex.It is not flexible company ,they delivered from third attempt.I called twice with request to deliver in afternoon but it wasn’t successfull.UPS it’s more flexible and have evening shifts.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Zadorina

customer_reviews.title: perfect screen to hide water heater
customer_reviews.text: this worked perfectly around my water heater.. i have a play area in my garage and didn’t want the kids to get close so this screen did the job. i will need to secure it asap.. very well made...
customer_reviews.author: nanamamaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Attractive room divider, and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed as a room divider. We got bamboo to deter the cat, and so far, he leaves it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: this screen is great, not too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: this screen is great, not too flimsy, used it as a screen for my open closet, its now behind my bed as a bed board, versatile,looks great, good weight, reasonable price,
customer_reviews.author: SHEERAH

customer_reviews.title: Nice but completely see through
customer_reviews.text: After seeing all those great reviews, I decided to buy 2. I unpacked one and it's disappointing because I can totally see through. and I am not talking about the hinges, I am talking about the panels. I need to return it bc I need it for privacy. Otherwise, it looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: amazing amazon with super room divider, description perfect and delivery was on time.
customer_reviews.text: perfect color style everything I wanted. Now my cats will have there spot and my living room looks good. very happy thank you
customer_reviews.author: connie deere

customer_reviews.title: perfect divider
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. stands nice, straight and level. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Knight

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Looks better than I expected and is larger than expected (I didn't measure). Of course it is fairly light weight because it is made from bamboo. If you live in a windy area and are putting it outside you will probably want to secure it. It suits my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mele

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like how light and easy it moves minus the fact that its still a bit see through. I was hoping for complete privacy but it does not provide that. Other than that its great.
customer_reviews.author: daphne

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Visually beautiful, well constructed, lightweight yet sturdy, easy to set up, fold, and put aside when not needed. Provides excellent privacy, while allowing airflow due to the earth-friendly bamboo. Wonderful product! I bought one each of the six and four panel.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: A good investment
customer_reviews.text: This is making a lovely curtain in a room with big windows. It seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Likely

customer_reviews.title: Hidden!
customer_reviews.text: If you are in a roommate situation with someone unpleasant, this will be your favorite piece of furniture! I feel "hidden" and much safer.
customer_reviews.author: HkH

customer_reviews.title: Love my screen
customer_reviews.text: Have in down the end of my kitchen to hide my craft area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I live in a studio apt and this is perfect for adding a little privacy to the bedroom nook.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Silbereisen

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! It offers privacy. You can't really see what's behind and yet we have many windows in the classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Princeton

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: You have to see this screen to believe it. So glad I bought this one. It is far more attractive than the descriptions I read about it.
customer_reviews.author: Nana53

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Versatile! Well made!!!!! Already assembled!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic!!!!!!!! A great addition for our loft! I may even order another one!
customer_reviews.author: margaret m. murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Really great, light weight room divider. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Fink Planet

customer_reviews.title: Extremely light weight... we use this to ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light weight... we use this to partition a part of our basement off that is full of "junk". An inexpensive way to make things look much more attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Filled a need
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this screen to give privacy to a sleeping area that is not usually private. It looks great and is steady when expanded. It is a little lighter weight than I had expected. It folds up and is out of the way when not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila B.

customer_reviews.title: We'll made!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! My patio has been transformed into a tropical paradise! Sturdy and we'll made. So happy I purchase theses freestanding beige partitions. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Skye Davis

customer_reviews.title: and nice to look at
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we were looking for to section an area off. It's well made, stable on carpet, and nice to look at. Really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ElfKat

customer_reviews.title: Would buy and recommend to friends!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to cover while undressing for infrared sauna at home and it is just perfect for coordinating with my sauna!
customer_reviews.author: trail junkie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality and feel
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing for outdoor use. Just make sure to properly anchor it or it will fly away pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: BCP

customer_reviews.title: consistent with the picture of the product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good value for the price. The item arrived according to delivery promise. The cardboard box was fairly beat up but the product was undamaged. the hinges are not high quality but the panels themselves look very nice. I purchased a second on as I was so pleased with the first one.
customer_reviews.author: H. Donis-Keller

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, light-weight, stable, beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful screen! Intricate bamboo work, light-colored, light-weight, stable, great space separator!! I love and recommend this gladly.
customer_reviews.author: G. Swaminathan

customer_reviews.title: beautiful screen
customer_reviews.text: this bamboo screen is light weight, easy to move around the yoga room where I use it. beautiful, simple, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Beam

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these to hide the furnace and converted the room into a large, walk-in closet! It's tall, and looks great, and hides the furnace! Oh, and it's well maid, and quite wide.
customer_reviews.author: Jamico

customer_reviews.title: Just like the photo
customer_reviews.text: This is a stable but light weight screen I am using as a room divider. The light color adds light to the room. I am very pleased with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brownell

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR MY DISPLAY BOOTH
customer_reviews.text: They are PERFECT for my needs in a display booth!!!! Could not be more pleased. They are beautiful, strong and durable. My goal was to create three walls within an 8x6 space and these fit perfectly. Since I was creating a tropical look, cannot say enough good things about these screens!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have sliders leading out of my bedroom to my lanai on a canal in Florida. Did not want to use blinds as I love the view! Decided to purchase this if we have visitors staying or simply want to block out light. Well made, attractive and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Moss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's very flexible. I use it as a headboard when I'm not dividing rooms.
customer_reviews.author: jvmo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and good value!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition! I bought this to add privacy to a room that had a large opening but no door. I’ve been searching for an affordable screen and hoped for something of quality. So happy this had both!! It’s very nice looking as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Easy to fold and hide away. A little heavy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty. Looks nice in space. Quality definitely for the price. Better then the description. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: DanceMom

customer_reviews.title: A Winner
customer_reviews.text: This one looks like Bamboo and fits in the corner of the greatroom like it was designed for it. Solid and reasonably well built for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ablebodiedseaman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. This item arrived fully assembled . Very natural looking! Sturdy and very functional; pretty woven work. I highly recommend this item. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and style. It's a bit more wobbly than I would have preferred but not too bad
customer_reviews.author: AngieB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful screen!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality and pricing of this screen!
customer_reviews.author: Jzar

customer_reviews.title: This screen is perfect! I love it
customer_reviews.text: This screen is perfect! I love it! I bought the natural/neutral color, and it is beautiful! It is lightweight, but strong and well-made. : ) --Shandor's Yoga Room, Pittsburgh, PA rachelshandor.wixsite.com/shandorsyogaroom
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Comments
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what we needed for a divider. It is beautiful and light in weight. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Betty Mooring

product_meta.title: MyGift Decorative Freestanding Brown Woven Bamboo 4 Panel Hinged Privacy Screen Portable Folding Room Divider
feature_bullets: A simple yet elegant deluxe room divider featuring 4 panels of sturdy woven bamboo in a stylish brown color
Perfect for adding visual interest to your decor, changing the shape of your space, and blocking off part of your of room as needed
The hinges that connect the panels allow you to instantly fold up this screen for easy storage and portability
**Official MyGift product includes multipurpose cleaning towel**
Approximate Dimensions (in inches): 19.75 W X 70.75 H X 0.75 D
